title: The John Vervaeke Care Agency
description:
Sources:

There is No Agency - #LARPgate 2021

Here's a Discord for people who don't hate me:
https://discord.gg/en9RuYuvqy

This is the charity of the most Jesus guy I've seen on YouTube, so if you're into donating to or investigating charities:
https://www.sharetanzania.co.uk/

Once upon a time, I told them I'd buy a shirt but they didn't have it with baseball sleeves. Therefore, I think I spoke this into existence. I now call it a vital part of the Truniform.
Truth Matters:  https://bit.ly/2CHsQBg
